Package: com.android.build.gradle.tasks

[Groovy] Class PreDex

      • com.android.build.gradle.tasks.PreDex

        • Methods Summary

            Type Name and description
            java.lang.String getBuildToolsVersion()
            static java.io.File getDexFileName(java.io.File outFolder, java.io.File inputFile)
            Returns a unique File for the pre-dexed library, even if there are 2 libraries with the same file names (but different paths)

        • Property Detail

          • @Nested DexOptionsImpl dexOptions

          • @Input boolean multiDex

          • @OutputDirectory java.io.File outputFolder

        • Method Detail

          • @Input java.lang.String getBuildToolsVersion()

          • @NonNull static java.io.File getDexFileName(@NonNull java.io.File outFolder, @NonNull java.io.File inputFile)

            Returns a unique File for the pre-dexed library, even if there are 2 libraries with the same file names (but different paths) If multidex is enabled the return File is actually a folder.

            Parameters:
            outFolder - the output folder.
            inputFile - the library
            multidex - whether multidex is enabled.
            Returns:

          • @TaskAction void taskAction(IncrementalTaskInputs taskInputs)
